授業目的:
Upon completion of this course, the students should be able to acquire the basic skills needed to undertake strategic management.
The students should be able to undertake case studies and statistical methods on the basis of the framework to be learned through this course.
到達目標:
Upon completion of this course, the students should be able to acquire the basic skills needed to undertake strategic management.
The students should be able to undertake a case studies and statistical methods on the basis of the framework to be learned through this course.
授業方法:
Lecture and in-class discussions based on the text,papers and case materials are the core of this course. Students will be required to fully prepare for each class and to actively express their thoughts, as well as share their experiences.The student have to read 4 to 5 academic papers(about 80～100pages) every week. Demonstrating their understanding of the acquired knowledge by presenting their thoughts and analyses both individually is highly encouraged. Interactive discussions, sharing of experiences and participation are key components of this course.
【for online sutudents】using zoom.

第1回:
1.MANAGERS AND MANAGING: Overview of managerial tasks / Management thought / Course introduction.
I take in-person lessons in this lecture,all time.
第2回: 2.VALUES, ATTITUDES, EMOTIONS AND CULTURE: Personality traits / Organizational culture / Constraining or enabling?
第3回: 3. STAKEHOLDERS AND SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY: Ethics and law / Profit impact of ethics / Boundaries on what needs to be managed.
第4回: 4.DECISION MAKING AND LEARNING: Cognitive biases / Group decision making / Organizational learning.
第5回: 5.PLAN AND STRATEGY: Mission and goals / Competitive analysis / Firm boundary.
第6回: 6.VALUE CHAIN: Value chain and competitive advantage / Competition or coordination? / Value chain and innovation.
第7回: 7.Resouce Based View / Intangible asset / Compitance management /
第8回: 8.Knowkedge Management / SECI model/ tacit knowledge / explicit knowledge/ knowledge convergion
第9回: 9.ORGANIZATIONAL STRUCTURE: Job design / Functions and divisions / Coordination.
第10回: 10.ORGANIZATIONAL CONTROL: Output control / Behavior control / Organizational change.
第11回: 11.HUMAN RESOURCE (MOTIVATION AND PERFORMANCE): Motivation / Training / Performance appraisal and feedback.
第13回: 13.CONFLICT, NEGOTIATION AND POLITICS: Power / Strategies for managing organizational conflict, negotiation and politics.
